title: Please help me finish the monster
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: Please help me finish the monster
posts.post_content:
Down to just 2 cards to finish the monster!!!!

I like raw VGish cards.  Prefer cards without back damage or writing.  A crease is totally fine.  Graded cards are ok, but I don't pay any premium for them in a holder, since I would crack them out.

Please email [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url] if you have anything you think I would like!

Kiernan JF SL
Kleinow Red NY Catching

it seems i might have dups of Bush - Polar bear or Piedmont 350 - 
Need to check to see condition

If you have dupes of your dupes, I might be interested in that Polar Bear.
Obviously give OP first crack though! So close to finishing...
